Description:
Nanahyakuichi Public Middle School (公立漆佰壱中学校, Kouritsu Nanahyakuichi Chuugakkou), called 701 Middle School in the Vertical translation, is an educational institution that Nadeko Sengoku is enrolled in.  
Many students of the school were involved in Deishuu Kaiki's swindling operations which involved selling fake magic charms. Koyomi Araragi and Sodachi Oikura also attended this school when they were in middle school.
